Independent services for property professionals by property professionals

Central Listing is a marketing, communication and administration software tool for UK property professionals.

We aim to reduce costs and improve productivity by automating repetitive and time consuming tasks, whilst giving agents full control of their own data online.

We also help improve service, agent performance and management effectiveness. Agents can interface with clients, customers, colleagues

and suppliers from one place.

As a showcase of the power of Central Listing and in order to assist property professionals, landlords, applicants and their suppliers in the property ecosystem, we tailored a number of tools to assist you with your property needs...
